text: John Ephraim Anderson (7 June 1931 – 2003) was an English professional footballer who played as a full-back for Grimsby Town. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2003 deaths Category:People from Northumberland Category:English footballers Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Crystal Palace F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: John Anderson (footballer, born 1931)
